structure_sections.description: "İyi akşamlar değerli izleyenler" - The presenter, Hande Bayraktar, opens the program and introduces the main topics of the day, signaling the start of the broadcast.

"Cumhurbaşkanı Erdoğan'dan ilk değerlendirme geldi" - This section contains the main news content, discussing various political events, statements from President Erdoğan, and updates on the CHP party's internal matters.
"sonunda günde geri" - The closing remarks of the program, where the presenter wraps up the news and bids farewell to the viewers.
